<a id="Script"></a>

# Script

**Inherits:** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [CSharpScript](CSharpScript.md), [GDScript](GDScript.md), [ScriptExtension](ScriptExtension.md)

A class stored as a resource.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A class stored as a resource. A script extends the functionality of all objects that instantiate it.

This is the base class for all scripts and should not be used directly. Trying to create a new script with this class will result in an error.

The ``new`` method of a script subclass creates a new instance. [Object.set_script()](Object.md#Object_method_set_script) extends an existing object, if that object's class matches one of the script's base classes.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Scripting documentation index](../tutorials/scripting/index.md)

## Property Descriptions

<a id="Script_property_source_code"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **source_code** [ðŸ”—](#Script_property_source_code)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_source_code**\ (\ value\: [String](String.md)\ )
- [String](String.md) **get_source_code**\ (\ )

The script source code or an empty string if source code is not available. When set, does not reload the class implementation automatically.

## Method Descriptions

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **can_instantiate**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Script_method_can_instantiate)

Returns ``true`` if the script can be instantiated.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Script_method_get_base_script"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Script](Script.md) **get_base_script**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Script_method_get_base_script)

Returns the script directly inherited by this script.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Script_method_get_global_name"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[StringName](StringName.md) **get_global_name**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Script_method_get_global_name)

Returns the class name associated with the script, if there is one. Returns an empty string otherwise.

To give the script a global name, you can use the ``class_name`` keyword in GDScript and the ``[GlobalClass]`` attribute in C#.




```gdscript
    class_name MyNode
    extends Node
```


```csharp
    using Godot;

    [GlobalClass]
    public partial class MyNode : Node
    {
    }
```

<a id="Script_method_get_rpc_config"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Variant](Variant.md) **get_rpc_config**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Script_method_get_rpc_config)

Returns a [Dictionary](Dictionary.md) mapping method names to their RPC configuration defined by this script.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Script_method_get_script_constant_map"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Dictionary](Dictionary.md) **get_script_constant_map**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Script_method_get_script_constant_map)

Returns a dictionary containing constant names and their values.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Script_method_get_script_method_list"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[Dictionary](Dictionary.md)\] **get_script_method_list**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Script_method_get_script_method_list)

Returns the list of methods in this **Script**.

\ **Note:** The dictionaries returned by this method are formatted identically to those returned by [Object.get_method_list()](Object.md#Object_method_get_method_list).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Script_method_get_script_property_list"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[Dictionary](Dictionary.md)\] **get_script_property_list**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Script_method_get_script_property_list)

Returns the list of properties in this **Script**.

\ **Note:** The dictionaries returned by this method are formatted identically to those returned by [Object.get_property_list()](Object.md#Object_method_get_property_list).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Script_method_get_script_signal_list"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Array](Array.md)\[[Dictionary](Dictionary.md)\] **get_script_signal_list**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Script_method_get_script_signal_list)

Returns the list of user signals defined in this **Script**.

\ **Note:** The dictionaries returned by this method are formatted identically to those returned by [Object.get_signal_list()](Object.md#Object_method_get_signal_list).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Script_method_has_script_signal"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **has_script_signal**\ (\ signal_name\: [StringName](StringName.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Script_method_has_script_signal)

Returns ``true`` if the script, or a base class, defines a signal with the given name.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Script_method_has_source_code"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **has_source_code**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Script_method_has_source_code)

Returns ``true`` if the script contains non-empty source code.

\ **Note:** If a script does not have source code, this does not mean that it is invalid or unusable. For example, a [GDScript](GDScript.md) that was exported with binary tokenization has no source code, but still behaves as expected and could be instantiated. This can be checked with [can_instantiate()](Script.md#Script_method_can_instantiate).

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Script_method_instance_has"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **instance_has**\ (\ base_object\: [Object](Object.md)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Script_method_instance_has)

Returns ``true`` if `base_object` is an instance of this script.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Script_method_is_abstract"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_abstract**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Script_method_is_abstract)

Returns ``true`` if the script is an abstract script. An abstract script does not have a constructor and cannot be instantiated.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Script_method_is_tool"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_tool**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#Script_method_is_tool)

Returns ``true`` if the script is a tool script. A tool script can run in the editor.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="Script_method_reload"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[Error](@GlobalScope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Error) **reload**\ (\ keep_state\: [bool](bool.md) = false\ ) [ðŸ”—](#Script_method_reload)

Reloads the script's class implementation. Returns an error code.
